channel.title: Help pls
channel.description: ok, i click on cache and i want to change my client background picture. please can you tell me what i need to do so i get one? please.. i looked on the tut but im not sure on what i need to delete since i have 2 files.

item.title: Help pls
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

ok, i know how to change it, but how do u change it to a complete different picture?

Read full topic

item.title: Help pls
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:3, topic:249239”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=328530.msg2570044#msg2570044 date=1228608597]
all u do is just edit the background that u have now and then change it too w/e u wnt it to be.

left-click and edit it ;D
[/quote]

then i guess u havent got a back-ground on the client? becuz that wut u shud do,
edit and change the background which shud come up in paint.net or just paint…

if i do that it comes up with paint and no pic :s[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help pls
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

no, it says on the tut go into cache and i clicked on .mpr_file_store_32 then i clicked on edit on one of them.
